testcase.title: Twitter tile in News Accordion not loading

steps.title: the page "Home" should be loaded on log on
I expand "News" Accordion in Home Page
I verify "News" the Accordions in Home page are open
I verify "Twitter" is display in 'Tile four' under news Accordion

substeps.message: News Feed is displayed under Twitter portlet

steps.title: I verify 'News Feed' is available in 'Tile four' under news Accordion

substeps.message: content of news feed is available

steps.title: I memorize the content of 'News Feed' on Twitter portlet
I click on 'new Feed' on Twitter portlet

substeps.message: Twitter page is open on new window

steps.title: I verify Twitter page is open on new window
